mapper.select: select id, corp_id, dept_id, post_id, name, account, password, gender, birthday, phone, email, deleted, create_time, update_time, creator_id, updater_id from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND deleted = 0;
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id, corp_id, dept_id, post_id, name, account, password, gender, birthday, phone, email, creator_id, updater_id,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{postId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update user
corp_id = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set corp_id = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
